name: Sacral and The Arcane Giant
description:
(note: this is a short one level demo made for my university course)

Take control of the wilderness witch Sacral as they delve into the ruined lair of the ancient Arcane Giant to save their partner Astral from an illness that can only be cured by a long lost spell, 

supposedly kept in the Giant's library deep below the earth.

Collect coins, keys, defeat the minions of the Giant and delve deeper into it's lair in this quirky little action-exploration fps.

This is my second prototype game created for university, a tone shift from my previous slow paced horror game to make a cartoony, light-hearted experience. 

Like with my previous uni game, this demo was just suppourting material to go along with a propose and although I will be bug fixing, 

the fate and expansion of this game is currently uncertain.

But I hope you enjoy it nonetheless
